file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: "1.0"
  title: "流程引擎接口文档"
  description: "流程模板管理"
  contact:
    name: Kaitong Zhang
    url: http://git.ztosys.com/zhangkaitong
    email: zhangkaitong@zto.com
servers:
  - description: Mock Server
    url: http://10.9.21.226:8088/
  - description: Localhost Server
    url: http://localhost:8088/app/rulai
  - description: Rulai Development Server
    url: http://10.9.21.130:8088/app/rulai
  - description: Rulai Quality Assessment Server
    url: http://10.9.47.121:8088/app/rulai
  - description: Rulai Production Server
    url: https://api-rulai.xlair.cn/app/rulai
components:
  securitySchemes:
    auth:
      description: api访问权限验证
      type: apiKey
      name: Authentication-Token
      in: header
tags:
  - name: web-api
    description: web可用api
paths:
  /task-flow-templates:
    get:
      description: 获取任务模板列表
      operationId: getTemplates
      tags:
        - web-api
      security:
        - auth: []
      responses:
        "200":
          description: 请求服务成功
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "task-flow-template.yaml#/components/schemas/TaskFlowTemplateMeta"
        "401":
          description: 用户未登陆或已失效
        "403":
          description: 无权限
    post:
      description: 创建任务模板
      operationId: createTemplate
      tags:
        - web-api
      security:
        - auth: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "task-flow-template.yaml#/components/schemas/TaskFlowTemplatePostForm"
      responses:
        "201":
          description: 创建成功
          headers:
            location: 
              description: 资源位置
              schema:
                type: string
        "401":
          description: 用户未登陆或已失效
        "403":
          description: 无权限
        "409":
          description: 模板已存在
        "422":
          description: 参数错误（模板过长）
      
  /task-flow-templates/{key}/{version}:
    parameters:
      - name: key
        in: path
        description: 模板唯一键
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: version
        in: path
        description: 版本号 (为空时表示最新版本)
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
    get:
      description: 获取任务模板详情
      operationId: getTemplate
      tags:
        - web-api
      security:
        - auth: []
      responses:
        "200":
          description: 请求服务成功
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "task-flow-template.yaml#/components/schemas/TaskFlowTemplate"
        "401":
          description: 用户未登陆或已失效
        "403":
          description: 无权限
        "404":
          description: 资源不存在
    put:
      description: 更新任务模板
      operationId: updateTemplate
      tags:
        - web-api
      security:
        - auth: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: string
      responses:
        "204":
          description: 请求服务成功
        "401":
          description: 用户未登陆或已失效
        "403":
          description: 无权限
        "404":
          description: 资源不存在
        "422":
          description: 参数错误（模板过长）
    delete:
      description: 删除任务模板
      operationId: deleteTemplate
      tags:
        - web-api
      security:
        - auth: []
      responses:
        "202":
          description: 删除成功
        "401":
          description: 用户未登陆或已失效
        "403":
          description: 无权限
        "404":
          description: 资源不存在


  /flow-tasks/{taskId}:
    parameters:
      - name: taskId
        in: path
        description: 任务id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
    get:
      description: 获取任务详情
      operationId: getFlowTask
      tags:
        - web-api
      security:
        - auth: []
      responses:
        "200":
          description: 请求服务成功
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "task.yaml#/components/schemas/FlowTask"
        "401":
          description: 用户未登陆或已失效
        "403":
          description: 无权限
        "404":
          description: 资源不存在
    post:
      description: 操作任务
      operationId: doOperation
      tags:
        - web-api
      security:
        - auth: []
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "task.yaml#/components/schemas/TaskOperation"
      responses:
        "204":
          description: 操作成功
        "401":
          description: 用户未登陆或已失效
        "403":
          description: 无权限
        "404":
          description: 资源不存在
        "409":
          description: 资源已被更新

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "/flow-tasks/{taskId}": get: operation "getFlowTask": responses: 200: content: application/json: schema: parse schema: at 1:485: external "task.yaml": get: file: local file reference is not allowed
